newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: TORAY PLANS $150 MLN CZECH DYE PLANT - CTK.
newsitem.headline: TORAY PLANS $150 MLN CZECH DYE PLANT - CTK.

text.p: Japan-based Toray Industries Inc., has agreed to build a new textile dye plant in the Czech Republic city of Prostejov, with planned greenfield investment estimated at $150 million, the Czech news agency CTK said on Thursday.

It quoted the head of the Czech state-funded investment support agency Czechinvest, Jan Havelka, as saying that the new plant would consist of a fully-automated textile dye and weaving operation in the eastern Czech city, which is the country's main centre of textile production.
Further details were not yet available.
